cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card.
Whenever Waking Watcher attacks, if defending player has no cards in hand, it gets +3/+3 and gains menace until end of turn.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, draw cards equal to that creature's power.

cards.rules_text:
Flash
When Wiretapper enters the battlefield, choose one—
• Exile target spell. For as long as it remains exiled, its owner can cast it. Spells cast this way cost {2} more to cast.
• Copy target spell. You may cast the copy.

Exile any number of target creatures you control. At the beginning of the next end step, return each creature card exiled this way and each creature card put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn to the battlefield tapped.
